nodes.name: claimAndSetNodeBody
claimAndSetNodeBody

claimAndSetNodeBody(bytes,bytes).details: claims a child node and sets the node body. See 'AKAP.claim' and 'AKAP.setNodeBody'.    * The new child node will transferred to the sender    * returns 1 if completed successfully otherwise 0
